definition[0]: to make something that is unfair or morally wrong seem acceptable and right
example[0]: There is a danger that these films legitimize violence.
definition[1]: to make something official or legal
example[1]: Acceptance by the UN would effectively legitimize the regime.
definition[2]: when parents legitimize a child, they get married so that the child becomes legitimate1(3)
definition[3]: to make something legal or official that had not been before
example[2]: He hopes to legitimize private ownership of toll roads in California.
definition[4]: to make something acceptable or popular
